name: Beaker with the Arms of Hirt and Maier (Stangenglas)
description: Beaker with the Arms of Hirt and Maier (Stangenglas); Unknown; The Böhmerwald, Germany; 1590; Free-blown colorless (slightly greenish-purple) glass with gold leaf and enamel decoration; 29.4 x 10.5 cm (11 9/16 x 4 1/8 in.); 85.DK.214; Gift of Ruth Blumka; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Beaker with the Arms of Hirt and Maier (Stangenglas)
culture: Probably southern Bohemian or the Boehmerwald
medium: Free-blown colorless (slightly greenish-purple) glass with gold leaf and enamel decoration
